entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Friday 03 March 2023
